website_summaries.verdict: Great addition to the fleet for serious earthworks.
pros: Designed to go outside in mud, gravel or sandpits, where it withstands rough treatment and the elements
Kids love the caterpillar tread action
cons: The tires can slip off, although are easily reattached

customer_reviews.title: Mostly plastic. Blade barely moves. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My son got a Tonka for his 1st birthday and it was a real metal, old school one. Now that he’s 2 and into cars and trucks we ordered him this to add to his collection. We were totally disappointed. It’s mostly plastic. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAuntPie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than standard Tonka size.
customer_reviews.text: Nephew wanted one so we ordered one for him This one is a bit smaller than the standard size but is built quite well. Decent metal content. Just be sure the size is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Phong Tran

customer_reviews.title: TONKA IS THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with TONKA, so have my children, and now my grandchildren. Sturdy. The best. My grandson plays for hours in his sandbox with these trucks! He even rides down a ramp sitting in the dump truck. I mistakenly ordered another truck I thought was TONKA but when it arrived it was apparent is was not. It didnt compare and I sent it back. My grandson is rough and tough. Plays hard and these trucks (dozer, crane & dump truck) passed the test. Not some plastic junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tonka Trucks, still in demand 😊
customer_reviews.text: Tonka trucks are great. Not like they were when I was a kid. Lots more plastic on them now but still good quality. My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the truck
customer_reviews.text: Love this it’s just like the trucks made back in the day the real steel ones. This was a great price and came in a great amount of time. The little ones love to play with this! Like I said the steel ones are better!
customer_reviews.author: SAWAYL 2019

customer_reviews.title: This is not Steel
customer_reviews.text: This was listed as a steel classics. It is mostly plastic, including the cab, the dozer blade and the mechanicals. I wanted a classic steel Tonka Bulldozer. Will most likely send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for any type of medium! Just as well built as they were 25 years ago when I was playing with them
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: First one stolen at soccer game. This is a replacement. Tonka metal toys last forever.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable toy.
customer_reviews.text: Will hold up over time. A well made and durable toy.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Tonka is still the brand to buy
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves it! Almost like the old ones, still sturdy tho
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Bought for our grandson. Uses outdoors in the dirt and mud. Cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what we ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson & this is "exactly what he wanted!" Will order more!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Teague

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts, but still durable
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a nicely designed toy. Its moving parts work well and it will likely last a while, short of being thrown or stomped on. I think where this truck is a bit of a letdown is in being labelled a "steel bulldozer," which likely makes people think of the old Tonka trucks that were 98% steel. This is around 40% steel, so some folks might be disappointed in that. Still, even with plastic parts, this truck is durable, it's just not as tough as the old models. Given the construction of the truck, I think it probably should be 10 to 15 bucks cheaper to be considered a great deal. Still, as is, it's not a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Edison

customer_reviews.title: Half plastic
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as the old Tonka trucks. The yellow body is metal, but the black parts (the scoop and the frame) and the wheels that are inside the tracks are all plastic. You can only raise the scoop about a quarter inch off the ground. The rubber tracks move well, but they constantly slip off the wheels (which frustrates my son).
customer_reviews.author: K.O.

customer_reviews.title: Real steel. Heavy duty and hardcore.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap plastic version. This is a serious, heavy duty, tough bulldozer, set to put up with anything your little darling can throw at it. Toss it? no problem. Bury it? No sweat. Find the metal detector and get it out. The treads are heavy duty. The plastic parts are heavy duty. The metal is heavy duty - but with nice rounded edges so there are no sharp bits.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old is obsessed with cars and trucks and was jumping up and down when he opened this tonka bulldozer. It is mostly made of steel but does have some plastic as well. We got this to put out in our sandbox for my kids to play with. It's probably not designed to be an outdoor, sandbox toy but my kids will love building and imagining with this thing. I love that it is heavy duty and my son loves pushing it around the house. Hope this was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: The most lasting toys
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a year now and it has accompanied us to every salty, Sandy beach day here on the east coast. It has spent every night the elements and snow and this thing has taken a beating with my two boys. It works just as good today as the day it came home. I hope to be able keep it around for my grandkids honestly!
customer_reviews.author: MMay

customer_reviews.title: Younger Sister Likes This
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my five-year-old granddaughter for her birthday, her three-year-old sister wound up having the most fascination with this toy. This toy is attractive and durable enough to withstand active youngsters playing with it and has been a source of pleasure and entertainment for my two youngest granddaughters.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis A Edge Jr

customer_reviews.title: This bulldozer is awesome. It instantly went in the sandbox.
customer_reviews.text: This bulldozer is awesome. It instantly went in the sandbox. My four year old really likes that the tracks and blade both work very well. He adores that the tracks leave actual tracks in the sand. He loves using the blade to grade and move sand around. This one is definitely a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Wildness

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, grandson approved.
customer_reviews.text: I took away a star because the scoop on this truck doesn't function as well as many of his other trucks, but my grandson still enjoys playing with this, regardless. It's a quality built truck that's been holding up to quite a bit of rough and tumble play. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa (M.W.)

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, but doesn't have a key feature!
customer_reviews.text: Son likes it, very heavy duty but it doesn't have a back ripper (dirt plow), and as it goes with 3 year old something not quite right is so obviously bad. The Bruder brand does have a back ripper but I'm not paying $40+ for it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Could be fun in a sandbox
customer_reviews.text: I haven't given this to my child yet because it will be a birthday gift, but I expect him to like it. I like that it doesn't require batteries and is all manual. The tracks move fine on the rug and floor but I wish the blade came up higher. That's really the only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Definately a must have for sandbox
customer_reviews.text: These bring back so many memories and never go out of style. My autistic son loves this so much he has taken it to bed with him each night. he plays with it all day long, inside and out. Then ever so gently gives it a bath and go to sleep with it. Its priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Breadsticks

customer_reviews.title: This is a classic!
customer_reviews.text: This is your classic, good quality, long lasting Tonka steel bulldozer. I was surprised that the box felt so light but upon taking the bulldozer out, there's no denying the quality in this thing. This is your standard, old fashioned, great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy toy
customer_reviews.text: It's a steel chassis on a plastic frame, but it's still cool to at least see some metal in the toy. I wish the plow was metal, but I assume that's a safety risk. I still think it's tonka tough and my kids love this in their sandbox.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: My boys absolutely love vehicles, so they were in heaven when I gave them this truck. It's a great size to drive around inside or out. The quality is pretty good. The treads like to come off the tires, but they go back on easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie and Heather Hejduk

customer_reviews.title: Tough toy for tough kids
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for tough little ones. It's built sturdy and with great materials. Will hold up to a lot of misuse, indoors or out.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Tonka - Steel Classics Bulldozer FFP
customer_reviews.text: Durable and well manufactured. Definitely not a cheap piece of equipment. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Classic toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. If you want a quality toy that will last get this.
customer_reviews.author: imsocrazy

product_meta.title: Basic Fun Tonka - Steel Classics Bulldozer FFP
product_meta.description: Style:BulldozerThe Tonka steel classics bulldozer is ready to demolish and clear away anything in its path! Move dirt, sand and gravel with the workable Blade and take control of any job site! This bulldozer is built Tonka tough with real steel! Official TONKA spokesperson Shaquille O’Neal will be the voice and face of the brand, encouraging kids to get active with a mantra of “Let’s Go Play!” Appropriate for ages 3 years and up.
feature_bullets: The Tonka steel bulldozer is ready to demolish and clear away anything in its path!
Move dirt, sand and gravel with the workable blade and take control of any job site!
This bulldozer is built Tonka tough with real steel!
Official TONKA spokesperson Shaquille O’Neal will be the voice and face of the brand, encouraging kids to get active with a mantra of “Let’s Go Play!”
Appropriate for ages 3 years and up.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars486 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
